DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine the optimal time for the nebulization depending on the respiratory physiotherapy session in cystic fibrosis patients.
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation of the Timing of the Nebulization Related to the Physiotherapy Session
DOC.criteria: Stable cystic fibrosis patients older than 16 y.o. Pseudomonas aeruginosa colonization Hypersecretion Kidney failure No pregnancy
